EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up With Renewal Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Please follow up with the Entity Name for Renewal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.OwnerFullName},
Please follow up with Entity {!Account.Name} for Renewal. The due date for the same is the "Renewal Date" mentioned on the Entity page. Herein is the link for the Entity {!Account.Link}.
Regards, Ffreedom Team.
